verbose_text: Our data demonstrated that TGF-beta1 not only induced the activation of the Smad pathway, but also induced the phosphorylation of AKT and ERK (XREF_FIG), which are commonly considered to be downstream molecules of the EGF / EGFR pathway.
evidence: TGF-beta1 not only induced the activation of the Smad pathway, but also induced the phosphorylation of AKT and ERK
